description: Cake decorating doesn't have to be hard. Try this easy hack and turn sliced pineapple into flowers to arrange over frosted mud cake for a show-stopping centrepiece.
name: Pineapple Flower Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove cakes from packaging. Trim cake tops to remove frosting, then discard tops. Place one cake, cut-side up, on a plate. Spread cake with one-third of the frosting, then sandwich with remaining cake, cut-side down. Spread top and side of cake with remaining frosting. Decorate cake with pineapple flowers. Serve immediately.
